train without notifying us, you will have to pay for it separately; the conductor cannot apply the money paid for your prior reservation. &nbsp;For more information please visit&nbsp;<a sold or issued by an unauthorized third party will be voided by Amtrak.&nbsp; This ticket is a contract of carriage which includes specific terms and conditions and a binding arbitration agreement
